content.p:
The source tar files can be found on the
ftp site.
To browse the source code you can use github.
To pull down the Heimdal git repository use the folling commands. To read more about git, read the Git Community book.
content.pre: git clone git@github.com:heimdal/heimdal.git cd heimdal autoreconf -f -i
git clone git@github.com:heimdal/heimdal.git cd heimdal git checkout -b heimdal-1-5-branch origin/heimdal-1-5-branch autoreconf -f -i
